name: Digital Sustainability Lead Curriculum (EQF Level 5)
description: Curriculum for Digital Sustainability Lead at EQF Level 5

role.name: Digital Sustainability Lead
role.description: Drives digital sustainability initiatives within organizations

modules.name: Sustainable Digital Transformation Strategy (EQF 5 Version)
modules.description: Develop holistic strategies for sustainability-focused digital transformation (This module has been adapted for EQF level 5.)

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Identify components of digital transformation strategies aligned with sustainability goals.
learning_outcomes.understanding: Explain the integration of sustainability principles into digital business strategies.
learning_outcomes.skills: Develop comprehensive digital transformation roadmaps that prioritize sustainability outcomes.

modules.name: Ethics and Governance in Digital Innovation (EQF 5 Version)
modules.description: Evaluate ethical implications of digital systems and ensure inclusive governance (This module has been adapted for EQF level 5.)

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Identify ethical considerations in digital innovation for sustainability.
learning_outcomes.understanding: Explain governance frameworks that support responsible technology deployment.
learning_outcomes.skills: Apply ethical principles to evaluate sustainability technologies and initiatives.

modules.name: Work-based Sustainability Project (EQF 5 Version)
modules.description: Apply sustainability knowledge in real-world workplace settings (This module has been adapted for EQF level 5.)

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Recognize organizational contexts for sustainability project implementation.
learning_outcomes.understanding: Explain sustainability project management methodologies in workplace settings.
learning_outcomes.skills: Execute a sustainability initiative in a real-world professional environment.

modules.name: Digital Resilience Strategies (EQF 5 Version)
modules.description: Building resilient digital systems and organizations to withstand sustainability challenges (This module has been adapted for EQF level 5.)

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Identify resilience principles and frameworks in digital sustainability contexts.
learning_outcomes.understanding: Explain how resilience thinking strengthens sustainability initiatives.
learning_outcomes.skills: Apply resilience assessment tools to evaluate organization's capacity to withstand sustainability disruptions.

modules.name: Sustainability Frameworks and Standards (EQF 5 Version)
modules.description: Overview of major sustainability frameworks, regulations, and standards (This module has been adapted for EQF level 5.)
skills: Familiarity with frameworks like GRI, SDGs

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Identify major sustainability frameworks, standards, and regulations relevant to digital industries.
learning_outcomes.understanding: Compare different sustainability reporting frameworks and their application contexts.
learning_outcomes.skills: Apply appropriate standards to evaluate organizational sustainability performance.

modules.name: Sustainable ICT Procurement and Policy (EQF 5 Version)
modules.description: Develop policies and practices for sustainable technology procurement (This module has been adapted for EQF level 5.)

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Identify sustainable procurement criteria for ICT equipment and services.
learning_outcomes.understanding: Explain policy frameworks that promote sustainable technology acquisition.
learning_outcomes.skills: Develop procurement policies that prioritize sustainability in ICT purchasing decisions.

modules.name: Climate Resilience through Digital Solutions (EQF 5 Version)
modules.description: Applying digital technologies to enhance climate resilience in organizations and communities (This module has been adapted for EQF level 5.)

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Identify climate risks and resilience opportunities addressable through digital technologies.
learning_outcomes.understanding: Explain connections between climate adaptation, mitigation, and digital solutions.
learning_outcomes.skills: Design digital interventions that enhance climate resilience in specific organizational contexts.

modules.name: Sustainable Business Models for Digital Companies (EQF 5 Version)
modules.description: Creating viable business models that integrate sustainability principles (This module has been adapted for EQF level 5.)

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Identify sustainable business model patterns for digital products and services.
learning_outcomes.understanding: Explain how sustainability principles can be integrated into core business models.
learning_outcomes.skills: Design economically viable business models that achieve sustainability objectives.

modules.name: Sustainable Business Models for Digital Companies (EQF 4 Version) (EQF 5 Version)
modules.description: Creating viable business models that integrate sustainability principles (This module has been adapted for EQF level 4.) (This module has been adapted for EQF level 5.)

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Critically evaluate sustainable business model patterns for digital products and services.
learning_outcomes.understanding: Synthesize how sustainability principles can be integrated into core business models.
learning_outcomes.skills: Design economically viable business models that achieve sustainability objectives.

modules.name: Applied Ethics in AI for Sustainability (EQF 5 Version)
modules.description: Address ethical considerations in AI applications for sustainability challenges (This module has been adapted for EQF level 5.)

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Identify ethical frameworks applicable to AI systems in sustainability contexts.
learning_outcomes.understanding: Explain potential ethical challenges in AI applications for environmental and social good.
learning_outcomes.skills: Apply ethical principles to the design and evaluation of AI-driven sustainability solutions.

modules.name: Applied Ethics in AI for Sustainability (EQF 5 Version)
modules.description: Address ethical considerations in AI applications for sustainability challenges (This module has been adapted for EQF level 5.)

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Identify ethical frameworks applicable to AI systems in sustainability contexts.
learning_outcomes.understanding: Explain potential ethical challenges in AI applications for environmental and social good.
learning_outcomes.skills: Apply ethical principles to the design and evaluation of AI-driven sustainability solutions.

modules.name: Sustainability Assessment and Benchmarking (EQF 5 Version)
modules.description: Evaluate organizational sustainability performance against relevant benchmarks (This module has been adapted for EQF level 5.)

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Identify sustainability assessment methodologies and benchmarking frameworks.
learning_outcomes.understanding: Explain performance evaluation approaches for digital sustainability initiatives.
learning_outcomes.skills: Conduct comprehensive sustainability assessments and comparative benchmarking.

modules.name: Digital Solutions for Social Inclusion (EQF 5 Version)
modules.description: Designing and implementing digital technologies that promote equity and inclusion (This module has been adapted for EQF level 5.)

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Identify social inclusion challenges addressable through digital solutions.
learning_outcomes.understanding: Explain how digital technologies can either exacerbate or mitigate social inequalities.
learning_outcomes.skills: Design inclusive digital solutions that address social sustainability challenges.

modules.name: Sector-Specific Digital Sustainability Applications (EQF 5 Version)
modules.description: Applying digital sustainability principles to specific industry domains (This module has been adapted for EQF level 5.)

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Identify sustainability challenges and opportunities in specific industry sectors.
learning_outcomes.understanding: Explain how digital sustainability principles must be adapted to sector-specific contexts.
learning_outcomes.skills: Apply digital sustainability approaches to address sector-specific challenges.

modules.name: Introduction to Digital Sustainability (EQF 5 Version)
modules.description: Fundamentals of digital sustainability concepts and principles (This module has been adapted for EQF level 5.)

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Define key concepts and principles of digital sustainability and their relevance to modern organizations.
learning_outcomes.understanding: Explain the relationship between digital technologies and environmental, social, and economic sustainability.
learning_outcomes.skills: Explain organizational practices for sustainability improvement opportunities using digital solutions.

modules.name: Circular Economy and Lifecycle Thinking (EQF 5 Version)
modules.description: Analyze product lifecycles and propose circular redesign strategies (This module has been adapted for EQF level 5.)

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Define circular economy principles and lifecycle assessment methodologies.
learning_outcomes.understanding: Explain how digital technologies can enable circular business practices.
learning_outcomes.skills: Conduct product lifecycle analyses and propose circular redesign strategies.

modules.name: Digital Circular Business Models (EQF 5 Version)
modules.description: Design business models that leverage digital technologies for circular economy (This module has been adapted for EQF level 5.)

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Identify digital business models that support circular economy principles.
learning_outcomes.understanding: Explain how digital technologies enable resource efficiency and circular value chains.
learning_outcomes.skills: Design business models that leverage digital technologies for sustainability outcomes.

modules.name: Gender Equality in Digital Sustainability (EQF 5 Version)
modules.description: Addressing gender disparities through sustainable digital solutions (This module has been adapted for EQF level 5.)

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Identify gender-related disparities in digital access and participation.
learning_outcomes.understanding: Explain how digital technologies can be designed to promote gender equality.
learning_outcomes.skills: Apply gender-inclusive approaches to digital sustainability initiatives.

modules.name: Sustainable Software Engineering (EQF 5 Version)
modules.description: Implement sustainable programming practices and optimize code efficiency (This module has been adapted for EQF level 5.)

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Identify energy-efficient coding practices and their environmental impact.
learning_outcomes.understanding: Explain the relationship between software design choices and resource consumption.
learning_outcomes.skills: Implement green coding principles to optimize software energy efficiency.

modules.name: Systems Architecture for Sustainability (EQF 5 Version)
modules.description: Design IT systems aligned with circular economy and low-impact principles (This module has been adapted for EQF level 5.)

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Describe system architecture principles that support sustainability goals.
learning_outcomes.understanding: Explain how system design decisions affect long-term sustainability performance.
learning_outcomes.skills: Design IT system architectures that minimize environmental footprint while maintaining functionality.

program_learning_outcomes: Apply advanced principles of digital sustainability to various professional contexts
Evaluate sustainability impacts of digital technologies using appropriate frameworks
Implement sustainability-focused improvements in digital systems and workflows
Communicate sustainability considerations to diverse stakeholders
Collaborate effectively in teams addressing digital sustainability challenges
